location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 18: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter William Digges Latouche discusses the expedition of Ismael Aga, Mussaleem of Bussora [Basra], against the Chaub [Bani Ka'ab]. He reports that Ismael Aga is assisted by Shaikh Twiney of the Montifiks [Shaikh Thuwayni of the Muntafiq] and by Shaik Abdulla of Grain [Kuwait].
